critique: The document is an executive order focused on ensuring high-quality education during the COVID-19 pandemic. It emphasizes the health and safety of students and educators, promotes in-person learning, and addresses educational disparities. It directs the Secretaries of Education and Health and Human Services to provide guidance, collect data, and develop strategies to mitigate the impact of COVID-19 on education. The document also encourages the Federal Communications Commission to increase connectivity options for students lacking reliable home broadband.
